Package camzup.pfriendly

Class ZImage

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PImage
camzup.pfriendly.ZImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, processing.core.PConstants
public class ZImage
extends processing.core.PImage
An extension of PImage, specializing in color gradients and blitting text to an image.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int DEFAULT_ALIGN
    Default horizontal alignment when creating an image from text.
    static int DEFAULT_KERNING
    Default spacing between characters when creating an image from text.
    static int DEFAULT_LEADING
    Default spacing between lines when creating an image from text.

      Parameters:

      yOrigin - the origin y coordinate
      radians - the angular offset
      grd - the gradient
      target - the output image

    • falseColor

      public static processing.core.PImage falseColor​(Gradient grd, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Float> clrEval, processing.core.PImage target)
      Recolors an image in-place with a color gradient. The color is converted to a factor in [0.0, 1.0] by an evaluation function.
      Parameters:
      grd - the color gradient
      clrEval - the color evaluator
      target - the target image
      Returns:
      the augmented image

    • falseColor

      public static processing.core.PImage falseColor​(Gradient grd, processing.core.PImage target)
      Recolors an image in-place with a color gradient. The image's luminance is used as the factor.
      Parameters:
      grd - the color gradient
      target - the target image
      Returns:
      the augmented image

    • fromText

      public static processing.core.PImage fromText​(processing.core.PFont font, java.lang.String text)
      Blits glyph images from a PFont onto a single image.
      Images created with this method do not have a reference to a parent PApplet. Defaults to the fill color white.
      Parameters:
      font - the Processing font
      text - the string of text
      Returns:
      the new image

    • fromText

      public static processing.core.PImage fromText​(processing.core.PFont font, java.lang.String text, Color clr)
      Blits glyph images from a PFont onto a single image.
      Images created with this method do not have a reference to a parent PApplet.
      Parameters:
      font - the Processing font
      text - the string of text
      clr - the color
      Returns:
      the new image

    • fromText

      public static processing.core.PImage fromText​(processing.core.PFont font, java.lang.String text, Color clr, int leading)
      Blits glyph images from a PFont onto a single image. The leading and is measured in pixels; negative values are not allowed.

      Images created with this method do not have a reference to a parent PApplet.
      Parameters:
      font - the Processing font
      text - the string of text
      clr - the color
      leading - spacing between lines
      Returns:
      the new image

    • fromText

      public static processing.core.PImage fromText​(processing.core.PFont font, java.lang.String text, Color clr, int leading, int kerning)
      Blits glyph images from a PFont onto a single image. The leading and kerning are measured in pixels; negative values are not allowed

      Images created with this method do not have a reference to a parent PApplet.
      Parameters:
      font - the Processing font
      text - the string of text
      clr - the color
      leading - spacing between lines
      kerning - spacing between characters
      Returns:
      the new image

    • fromText

      public static processing.core.PImage fromText​(processing.core.PFont font, java.lang.String text, Color clr, int leading, int kerning, int textAlign)
      Blits glyph images from a PFont onto a single image. The leading and kerning are measured in pixels; negative values are not allowed. The horizontal text alignment may be either center PConstants.CENTER ( 3 ), right PConstants.RIGHT ( 39 ) or left PConstants.LEFT ( 37 ).

      Images created with this method do not have a reference to a parent PApplet.
      Parameters:
      font - the Processing font
      text - the string of text
      clr - the color
      leading - spacing between lines
      kerning - spacing between characters
      textAlign - the horizontal alignment
      Returns:
      the new image

    • fromText

      public static processing.core.PImage fromText​(processing.core.PFont font, java.lang.String text, int clr)
      Blits glyph images from a PFont onto a single image.
      Images created with this method do not have a reference to a parent PApplet.
      Parameters:
      font - the Processing font
      text - the string of text
      clr - the color
      Returns:
      the new image

      public static processing.core.PImage fromText​(processing.core.PFont font, java.lang.String text, int clr, int leading, int kerning, int textAlign)
      Blits glyph images from a PFont onto a single image. The leading and kerning are measured in pixels; negative values are not allowed. The horizontal text alignment may be either center PConstants.CENTER ( 3 ), right PConstants.RIGHT ( 39 ) or left PConstants.LEFT ( 37 ).

      Images created with this method do not have a reference to a parent PApplet.

      clr - the color
      leading - spacing between lines
      kerning - spacing between characters
      textAlign - the horizontal alignment
      Returns:
      the new image

    • linear

      public static processing.core.PImage linear​(float xOrigin, float yOrigin, float xDest, float yDest, Gradient grd, processing.core.PImage target)
      Generates a linear gradient from an origin point to a destination point. The value is clamped to a range [0.0, 1.0] .
      Parameters:
      xOrigin - the origin x coordinate
      yOrigin - the origin y coordinate
      xDest - the destination x coordinate
      yDest - the destination y coordinate
      grd - the gradient
      target - the output image
      Returns:
      the image

    • linear

      public static processing.core.PImage linear​(Vec2 origin, Vec2 dest, Gradient grd, processing.core.PImage target)
      Generates a linear gradient from an origin point to a destination point. The value is clamped to a range [0.0, 1.0] .
      Parameters:
      origin - the origin
      dest - the destination
      grd - the gradient
      target - the output image
      Returns:
      the image

    • radial

      public static processing.core.PImage radial​(float xOrigin, float yOrigin, float radius, Gradient grd, processing.core.PImage target)
      Generates a radial gradient. This does not account for aspect ratio, so an image that is not 1:1 will result in an ellipsoid.
      Parameters:
      xOrigin - the x coordinate
      yOrigin - the y coordinate
      radius - the radius
      grd - the gradient
      target - the output image
      Returns:
      the image

    • radial

      public static processing.core.PImage radial​(Vec2 origin, float radius, Gradient grd, processing.core.PImage target)
      Generates a radial gradient. This does not account for aspect ratio, so an image that is not 1:1 will result in an ellipsoid.
      Parameters:
      origin - the origin
      radius - the radius
      grd - the gradient
      target - the output image
      Returns:
      the image

    • rgb

      public static processing.core.PImage rgb​(processing.core.PImage target)
      Generates a diagnostic image where a pixel's location on the x-axis correlates to the color red; on the y-axis, to green.
      Parameters:
      target - the output image
      Returns:
      the image

      public static java.lang.String toString​(processing.core.PImage img)

    • wrap

      public static int[] wrap​(int[] source, int wSource, int hSource, int[] target, int wTarget, int hTarget, int dx, int dy)
      Blits a source image's pixels onto a target image's pixels, using integer floor modulo to wrap the source image. The source image can be offset horizontally and/or vertically, creating the illusion of parallax.
      Parameters:
      source - source pixel array
      wSource - source image width
      hSource - source image height
      target - target pixel array
      wTarget - target image width
      hTarget - target image height
      dx - horizontal pixel offset
      dy - vertical pixel offset
      Returns:
      the target pixels

    • wrap

      public static processing.core.PImage wrap​(processing.core.PImage source, processing.core.PImage target, float dx, float dy)
      Blits a source image's pixels onto a target image's pixels, using integer floor modulo to wrap the source image. The source image can be offset horizontally and/or vertically, creating the illusion of parallax.
      Parameters:
      source - the source image
      target - the target image
      dx - horizontal pixel offset
      dy - vertical pixel offset
      Returns:
      the image

    • wrap

      public static processing.core.PImage wrap​(processing.core.PImage source, processing.core.PImage target, int dx, int dy)
      Blits a source image's pixels onto a target image's pixels, using integer floor modulo to wrap the source image. The source image can be offset horizontally and/or vertically, creating the illusion of parallax.
      Parameters:
      source - the source image
      target - the target image
      dx - horizontal pixel offset
      dy - vertical pixel offset
      Returns:
      the image

    • wrap

      public static processing.core.PImage wrap​(processing.core.PImage source, processing.core.PImage target, Vec2 d)
      Blits a source image's pixels onto a target image's pixels, using integer floor modulo to wrap the source image. The source image can be offset horizontally and/or vertically, creating the illusion of parallax.
      Parameters:
      source - the source image
      target - the target image
      d - pixel offset
      Returns:
      the image
